title: High pink in new patch 6.14
body: Before this patch, I had ping in the range 30-34. Now, I have ping in the range 290-240, and sometimes rarely go over 300. I don't know what happened, but my FPS seems to be fine. Any ways this problem can be resolved?

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=NikDzoni,realm=EUNE,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=sPnO378Y,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-07-16T19:38:28.066+0000)
>
> Before this patch, I had ping in the range 30-34. Now, I have ping in the range 290-240, and sometimes rarely go over 300. I don&#039;t know what happened, but my FPS seems to be fine. Any ways this problem can be resolved?

I have the same problem, idk what rito did but it screws my gameplay ALOT

I'd like to know an answer/ resolve also. Before patch a couple weeks ago my ping was around a constant 60 and never more than 80 throughout the entire day. Now lately during the day its about 120 at the lowest, and about 250 max during night (I assume more people player so server delays?) and have reached a max of 12,000 before I DC the game... I'm sure a couple people have reported me before for DC but I generally do logout and back in to continue game.. last game I played I DC and ended up running into the lane and just straight dying and logging out and back in the chat was bashing me and asking everyone in game to report me for feeding and dc.. I'm afraid most times to play a game now cause I don't want to be reported 500 times for this..

You could be experiencing a similar issue, and the  [Connection Issue](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide may be able to help you out with this as well.  Please let me know the outcome or if you experience further issues with this!

This helped me it dropped my ping from 200 - 40 still not my regular 34ping but playable thanks .

Windows Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8

Press the Windows Key (the key on the left side of the spacebar, between ctrl and alt)
Type cmd
Right-click the Command prompt shortcut and select "Run as Administrator" from the drop down menu. You should now see a black window with white letters.
Type ipconfig /release in the command prompt.
Press [Enter]
Type ipconfig /renew in the command prompt.
Press [Enter]
Type ipconfig /flushdns in the command prompt
Press [Enter]
Close the command prompt and attempt to make a connection.
I have the same problem. Normaly i had about 30 ping and after the new patch its 300+ non stop. And i can sure you that my internet conection is fine.

It sounds like the stability with your connection or routing has changed, and taking a long time to reach the game server.  I suggest going over the [Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) article which provides some steps to get this fixed.  If not, please let me know and we can look into some other possibilities.
